name: stackoverflow_scrape_user
description: Scrape a Stack Overflow user profile. Returns display name, reputation, badges, about, location, top tags, and recent activity.

steps.code: const nameEl = document.querySelector('.profile-user--name h1, h1, [class*="user-card"] [class*="name"]'); const reputationEl = document.querySelector('[title*="reputation"], .reputation, [class*="reputation"] span'); const aboutEl = document.querySelector('.profile-user--about, [class*="about-me"], .js-about-me-content'); const locationEl = document.querySelector('[class*="location"], .profile-user--location, [title="Location"] + span'); const memberSinceEl = document.querySelector('[class*="member-since"], [title*="Member"]'); const avatarEl = document.querySelector('.profile-user--avatar img, .user-avatar img, .avatar img'); const goldEl = document.querySelector('.badge1 + .badgecount, [title*="gold"] + span'); const silverEl = document.querySelector('.badge2 + .badgecount, [title*="silver"] + span'); const bronzeEl = document.querySelector('.badge3 + .badgecount, [title*="bronze"] + span'); const answersEl = document.querySelector('[href*="?tab=answers"] .s-navigation--item-count, [class*="answers-count"]'); const questionsEl = document.querySelector('[href*="?tab=questions"] .s-navigation--item-count, [class*="questions-count"]'); const tagEls = document.querySelectorAll('.s-tag, .post-tag, [class*="top-tags"] a'); const topTags = []; tagEls.forEach(function(el, idx) { if (idx < 10) topTags.push(el.textContent.trim()); }); return { name: nameEl ? nameEl.textContent.trim() : '', reputation: reputationEl ? reputationEl.textContent.trim() : '', about: aboutEl ? aboutEl.textContent.trim().substring(0, 500) : '', location: locationEl ? locationEl.textContent.trim() : '', member_since: memberSinceEl ? memberSinceEl.textContent.trim() : '', avatar: avatarEl ? avatarEl.getAttribute('src') : '', badges: { gold: goldEl ? goldEl.textContent.trim() : '0', silver: silverEl ? silverEl.textContent.trim() : '0', bronze: bronzeEl ? bronzeEl.textContent.trim() : '0' }, answers: answersEl ? answersEl.textContent.trim() : '', questions: questionsEl ? questionsEl.textContent.trim() : '', top_tags: topTags, profile_url: window.location.href }
